sections.title: Asavir (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Asavir class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Asavir)
sections.description: Asavirs are proficient with simple weapons, martial weapons, and all forms of armor and shields except tower shields.

sections.title: Camaraderie (Ex) (Asavir)
sections.description: Enhances the aid another action by increasing the bonus granted to allies within 30 feet, scaling from +1 at 1st level to +3 at 9th level.

sections.title: Equine Bond (Ex) (Asavir)
sections.description: Grants a horse mount that functions as an animal companion using asavir level + 2 as effective druid level, with special bonuses including no armor check penalty on Ride checks.

sections.title: Shaitan’s Blessing (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Grants the asavir's mount a +2 racial bonus on saves against mind-affecting and fear effects, increasing to +4 at 9th level.

sections.title: Thunderous Charge (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Allows a special charge that moves at normal speed but creates an area effect that knocks creatures prone within a radius that scales with level.

sections.title: Aura of Courage (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Grants an aura of courage identical to a 3rd-level paladin's ability, providing immunity to fear effects to nearby allies.

sections.title: Flank Breaker (Ex) (Asavir)
sections.description: After damaging a flanking enemy, allows a swift action combat maneuver to prevent that foe from flanking for 1 round.

sections.title: Controlled Charge (Ex) (Asavir)
sections.description: Improves mounted charge attacks by granting +4 attack bonus instead of +2 and eliminating the AC penalty after charging.

sections.title: Djinni’s Blessing (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Increases mount's speed by 10 feet, removes barding movement penalties, and allows carrying a second rider without penalty.

sections.title: Marid’s Blessing (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Eliminates concentration checks for riders due to mount movement and grants the mount a +2 racial bonus on Reflex saves.

sections.title: Trampling Gallop (Ex) (Asavir)
sections.description: Grants the mount the trample universal monster ability when commanded as a full-round action by the asavir.

sections.title: All Eyes on Me (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Creates a challenge effect that makes enemies flat-footed and gives them -2 AC against the asavir's allies' attacks.

sections.title: Efreeti’s Blessing (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Grants the mount fire resistance 5 and adds 1d6 fire damage to its hoof attacks.

sections.title: Inspiring Leader (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Provides allies within 60 feet a morale bonus equal to Charisma bonus on attack and damage rolls for 1 round as a move action.

sections.title: Janni’s Blessing (Su) (Asavir)
sections.description: Allows rerolling d20s once per day for both asavir and mount, plus grants +1 luck bonus on all saving throws.
